title: В Госдуме назвали дискриминацией блокировку аккаунта Russia Today в Telegram на Украине
cleaned_sentences: The State Duma called the discrimination of the block of the Russia Today account in Telegram in Ukraine - Gettyimages.ru “At least the fact that the channel is blocked without warning and a full explanation already raises a lot of questions ...

In any case, the restriction of the media in the right to convey the position of our country in different languages ​​and in different countries is a discrimination and a direct violation of freedom of speech.
You can’t turn a blind eye to this, ”the deputy said.
Previously, Telegram blocked in Ukraine the Russia Today account is allegedly due to violation of local legislation.
According to the publication "Strana.ua", the blocking was also subjected to related RT Telegram channels.
